content: Good morning! I'm currently working on an IG that makes very very extensive use of the PHIN VADS vocabulary. Thanks to @Grahame Grieve , we are successfully able to use PHIN VADS value sets because of the us.cdc.phinvads package. However, we are now running into the issue of needing to use a CDC code system (PHIN Questions) which leads to build and validation errors for our IG. I know there was a thread about this issue last year and there was mention of involving the HTA and connecting with the CDC to work out these code system issues. I was wondering if there have been any updates on this effort and if not, I wanted to know the process for putting forth the effort to get the PHIN Questions code system supported.
@Rob Hausam, I wanted to follow up on this topic

@Andy Stevens I'm not sure of any details on this. I think we will need to check (again?) with HTA. @Reuben Daniels @Carol Macumber
There is an HTA meeting today, but I expect this might need to be put on the agenda for a future call.
hi @Andy Stevens , Do you have a JIRA ticket associated with your specific request? If not, please open one and I'll be sure to get it on the agenda for the next call
